Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and value. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its quality and capabilities, I believe it's worth every penny of $15000. I trust it will meet and exceed your expectations, providing significant benefits and returns on your investment. Let's make this opportunity yours today! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
